description.english: You have truly lived the life of a mercenary
description.german: Du hast wahrhaftig wie ein Söldner gelebt
description.french: Vous avez mené une véritable vie de mercenaire.
description.italian: Hai davvero vissuto la vita di un mercenario.
description.spanish: Has vivido realmente la vida de un mercenario.
description.schinese: 你切身体验到了雇佣兵的生活
description.russian: Вы открыли для себя жизнь настоящего наемника
description.japanese: 傭兵としての使命を全うした
description.brazilian: Você realmente viveu a vida de um mercenário.

description.english: Finished level 'Dungeon'
description.french: Vous avez terminé le niveau 'Donjon'.
description.italian: Hai completato il livello 'Sotterranei'.
description.spanish: Has acabado el nivel 'Mazmorra'.
description.schinese: 完成关卡“地牢”
description.japanese: 「ダンジョン」レベルをクリア
description.brazilian: Concluiu a fase “Masmorra”

description.english: Met Veronique
description.french: Vous avez rencontré Véronique.
description.italian: Hai incontrato Veronique.
description.spanish: Has conocido a Veronique.
description.schinese: 遇见维罗妮可
description.japanese: ヴェロニークに出会った
description.brazilian: Conheceu Veronique

description.english: Met Alvita
description.french: Vous avez rencontré Alvita.
description.italian: Hai incontrato Alvita.
description.spanish: Has conocido a Alvita.
description.schinese: 遇见阿尔维塔
description.japanese: アルヴィータに出会った
description.brazilian: Conheceu Alvita

description.english: Enter area 2
description.french: Vous êtes entré(e) dans la zone 2.
description.italian: Sei entrato nell'area 2.
description.spanish: Has entrado en la zona 2.
description.schinese: 进入区域2
description.japanese: エリア2に進入
description.brazilian: Entrou na área 2

description.english: Enter area 3
description.french: Vous êtes entré(e) dans la zone 3.
description.italian: Sei entrato nell'area 3.
description.spanish: Has entrado en la zona 3.
description.schinese: 进入区域3
description.japanese: エリア3に進入
description.brazilian: Entrou na área 3

description.english: Enter the castle
description.french: Vous êtes entré(e) dans le château.
description.italian: Sei entrato nel castello.
description.spanish: Has entrado al castillo.
description.schinese: 进入城堡
description.japanese: 城に入る
description.brazilian: Entrou no castelo

description.english: Finished JA Rage
description.french: Vous avez terminé Jagged Alliance Rage.
description.italian: Hai completato JA Rage.
description.spanish: Has acabado JA Rage.
description.schinese: 通关《铁血联盟：愤怒》
description.japanese: ゲームをクリア
description.brazilian: Finalizou JA Rage

description.english: Found all weapon types in the game
description.french: Vous avez trouvé tous les types d'armes du jeu.
description.italian: Hai trovato tutti i tipi di arma nel gioco.
description.spanish: Has encontrado todos los tipos de arma en el juego.
description.schinese: 找到游戏中所有类型的武器
description.russian: Вы нашли все виды оружия в игре
description.japanese: すべての武器タイプを発見
description.polish: Znaleziono wszystkie rodzaje broni w grze
description.brazilian: Encontrou todos os tipos de armas do jogo

description.english: Killed first enemy
description.french: Vous avez tué votre premier ennemi.
description.italian: Hai ucciso il tuo primo nemico.
description.spanish: Has matado a tu primer enemigo.
description.schinese: 第一次杀死敌人
description.japanese: 初めて敵を殺した
description.brazilian: Matou seu primeiro inimigo

description.english: Found your clothes
description.french: Vous avez trouvé vos vêtements.
description.italian: Hai trovato i tuoi abiti.
description.spanish: Has encontrado tu ropa.
description.schinese: 找到你的衣物
description.japanese: 衣服を発見
description.brazilian: Encontrou suas roupas

description.english: Used rage skill for the first time
description.french: Vous avez utilisé votre première compétence de rage.
description.italian: Hai usato l'abilità furia per la prima volta.
description.spanish: Has usado una habilidad de furia por primera vez.
description.schinese: 第一次使用怒气技能
description.japanese: 初めてレイジスキルを使用
description.polish: Po raz pierwszy użyto umiejętności szału
description.brazilian: Usou habilidade de fúria pela 1ª vez

description.english: Killed an enemy with a spoon
description.german: Einen Feind mit einem Löffel getötet
description.french: Vous avez tué un ennemi avec une cuillère.
description.italian: Hai ucciso un nemico con un cucchiaio.
description.spanish: Has matado a un enemigo con una cuchara.
description.schinese: 用餐勺杀死一个敌人
description.japanese: スプーンで敵を殺した
description.brazilian: Matou um inimigo com uma colher

description.english: Killed enemies with each kitchen utensil in the game
description.german: Mit jedem Küchenutensil im Spiel einen Feind getötet
description.french: Vous avez tué des ennemis avec chaque ustensile de cuisine du jeu.
description.italian: Hai ucciso dei nemici con ogni utensile da cucina nel gioco.
description.koreana: 게임 내 모든 주방용품으로 적 처치
description.spanish: Has matado a enemigos con todos los utensilios de cocina del juego.
description.schinese: 用游戏中的每一种餐具杀死过敌人
description.russian: Вы убили врага каждым столовым прибором в игре
description.japanese: それぞれのキッチン道具で敵を殺した
description.polish: Zabito wroga każdym rodzajem sztućców dostępnym w grze
description.brazilian: Matou inimigos com cada um dos utensílios de cozinha do jogo

description.english: Killed the water poisoner in Reservoir before he could poison all 4 basins
description.german: Den Wasservergifter am Stausee getötet, bevor er alle 4 Becken vergiften konnte
description.french: Vous avez tué la personne empoisonnant le réservoir avant qu'elle n'ait atteint les 4 bassins.
description.italian: Hai eliminato l'avvelenatore dell'acqua al bacino prima che potesse avvelenare tutte le 4 cisterne.
description.koreana: 급수장에서 식수 오염자가 저수장 4곳 모두에 독을 풀기 전에 처치
description.spanish: Has matado a quien envenenaba el agua de la reserva antes de que pudiera envenenar las 4 albercas.
description.schinese: 在4个水池全部被污染前杀死污染水库的人
description.russian: Вы убили отравителя воды в задании «Водохранилище» прежде, чем он смог отравить все 4 водоема
description.japanese: 貯水池で4つのシンクすべてに毒が入れられる前に犯人を殺した
description.polish: Zabito truciciela w lokacji „Zbiornik wodny”, zanim zdążył zatruć wszystkie 4 zbiorniki
description.brazilian: Matou o envenenador da água no Reservatório antes que ele envenenasse os 4 tanques

description.english: Most civilians survived in Prison
description.german: Die meisten Zivilisten im Gefängnis haben überlebt
description.french: Vous avez permis à la plupart des civils de survivre dans la prison.
description.italian: La maggior parte dei civili nel carcere è sopravvissuta.
description.spanish: Has conseguido que la mayoría de civiles de la cárcel sobrevivan.
description.schinese: 监狱中的大多数平民得以幸存
description.russian: Вы спасли большинство гражданских в задании «Тюрьма»
description.japanese: 牢屋のほとんどの一般人が生き残った
description.brazilian: A maioria dos civis sobreviveu na Prisão

description.english: Killed the Black Mercs in Harbor before they could flee
description.german: Die Schwarzhemden im Hafen getötet, bevor sie fliehen konnten
description.french: Vous avez tué les mercenaires noirs au port avant qu'ils ne s'enfuient.
description.italian: Hai ucciso i mercenari neri al porto prima che potessero fuggire.
description.koreana: 항구에서 검은 용병단이 도망치기 전에 처치
description.spanish: Has matado a todos los Mercenarios Negros del puerto antes de que pudieran huir.
description.schinese: 在港口的黑雇佣兵逃走前杀死他们
description.russian: Вы перебили чернорубашечников в задании «Гавань», не дав им сбежать
description.japanese: 港で黒傭兵に逃げられる前に殺した
description.polish: Zabito Czarne Koszule na przystani, zanim udało im się uciec
description.brazilian: Matou os Mercenários Negros no Porto antes que pudessem fugir

description.english: Finished the game with all mercs
description.german: Das Spiel mit allen Söldnern durchgespielt
description.french: Vous avez terminé le jeu avec tous les mercenaires.
description.italian: Hai completato il gioco con tutti i mercenari.
description.spanish: Has acabado el juego con todos los mercenarios.
description.schinese: 用所有雇佣兵通关游戏
description.russian: Вы закончили игру со всеми наемниками
description.japanese: すべての傭兵と共にゲームをクリア
description.brazilian: Completou o jogo com todos os mercenários

description.english: Found alien weapon
description.french: Vous avez trouvé une arme extraterrestre.
description.italian: Hai trovato l'arma aliena.
description.spanish: Has encontrado un arma alienígena.
description.schinese: 找到外星武器
description.japanese: エイリアンの武器を発見
description.brazilian: Encontrou uma arma alienígena

description.english: Played a map in co-op
description.french: Vous avez joué sur une carte en coopération.
description.italian: Hai giocato a una mappa in cooperativa.
description.spanish: Has jugado un mapa en modo cooperativo.
description.schinese: 在合作模式中进行一张地图
description.russian: Вы сыграли задание в совместном режиме
description.japanese: 協力モードで1つのマップをプレイ
description.polish: Zagrano na mapie w trybie współpracy
description.brazilian: Jogou um mapa em coop.

description.english: Used all rage skills in the game
description.french: Vous avez utilisé toutes les compétences de rage du jeu.
description.italian: Hai usato tutte le abilità furia nel gioco.
description.koreana: 게임 내 모든 분노 스킬 사용
description.spanish: Has usado todas las habilidades de furia del juego.
description.schinese: 使用过游戏中所有的怒气技能
description.russian: Вы использовали все «яростные» способности в игре
description.japanese: すべてのレイジスキルを使用
description.polish: Użyto wszystkich umiejętności opartych na szale
description.brazilian: Usou todas as habilidades de fúria do jogo

description.english: No civilian was killed in a playthrough
description.german: Bei einem Spiel wurde kein Zivilist getötet
description.french: Vous avez terminé le jeu sans qu'aucun civil ne soit tué.
description.italian: Non hai ucciso alcun civile nel gioco.
description.koreana: 게임 플레이 동안 민간인이 죽지 않음
description.spanish: Has completado el juego sin que ningún civil muera asesinado.
description.schinese: 在一次通关中无任何平民被杀死
description.russian: За все время игры не погиб ни один гражданский
description.japanese: 一般人を1人も死なせずにゲームクリア
description.polish: W trakcie kampanii nie zginął żaden cywil
description.brazilian: Nenhum civil foi morto durante o jogo

description.english: Under the influence of Bliss for the first time
description.german: Zum ersten Mal unter dem Einfluss von Bliss
description.french: Vous avez subi l'influence de l'Extase pour la première fois.
description.italian: Hai subito per la prima volta l'influenza della bliss!
description.spanish: Has estado por primera vez bajo la influencia del Bliss.
description.schinese: 第一次遭受弗气的影响
description.japanese: 初めてブリスの効果を経験
description.polish: Po raz pierwszy znajdź się pod wpływem haju
description.brazilian: Ficou sob a influência de gás Bliss pela primeira vez

description.english: Intercepted a convoy
description.french: Vous avez intercepté un convoi.
description.italian: Hai intercettato un convoglio.
description.spanish: Has interceptado un convoy.
description.schinese: 拦下一支车队
description.japanese: 護送を妨害した
description.brazilian: Interceptou um comboio

description.english: Carried a rubberduck through the whole game
description.german: Eine Gummiente durch das gesamte Spiel getragen
description.french: Vous avez transporté un canard en plastique à travers tout le jeu.
description.italian: Hai portato una paperella di gomma per tutto il gioco.
description.koreana: 게임 플레이 내내 고무 오리 휴대
description.spanish: Has llevado un pato de goma a lo largo de todo el juego.
description.schinese: 全程带着黄鸭通关游戏
description.russian: Вы носили резиновую уточку с собой всю игру
description.japanese: ゴムのアヒルをずっと持ったままゲームクリア
description.polish: Przez całą grę miej przy sobie gumową kaczuszkę
description.brazilian: Carregou um patinho de borracha durante todo o jogo

description.english: Killed 100 guards
description.french: Vous avez tué 100 gardes.
description.italian: Hai ucciso 100 guardie.
description.spanish: Has matado a 100 guardias.
description.schinese: 杀死100个守卫
description.japanese: 護衛を100人殺した
description.brazilian: Matou 100 guardas

description.english: Killed 50 black mercs
description.french: Vous avez tué 50 mercenaires noirs.
description.italian: Hai ucciso 50 mercenari neri.
description.spanish: Has matado a 50 Mercenarios Negros.
description.schinese: 杀死50个黑雇佣兵
description.japanese: 50人の黒傭兵を殺した
description.brazilian: Matou 50 mercenários Negros

description.english: Has modified a weapon
description.french: Vous avez modifié une arme.
description.italian: Hai modificato un'arma.
description.spanish: Has modificado un arma.
description.schinese: 改造一支武器
description.japanese: 武器を改造
description.brazilian: Teve uma arma modificada

description.english: Has crafted an item
description.french: Vous avez fabriqué un objet.
description.italian: Hai creato un oggetto.
description.spanish: Has fabricado un objeto.
description.schinese: 制作一件物品
description.japanese: アイテムを作成
description.brazilian: Criou um item

description.english: Use a rebel squad to stop an enemy troop
description.german: Feindliche Truppen mit einem Rebellentrupp aufgehalten
description.french: Vous avez arrêté une troupe ennemie avec une unité rebelle.
description.italian: Hai usato una squadra di ribelli per fermare le truppe nemiche.
description.koreana: 반군 분대를 이끌고 적 부대 제압
description.spanish: Has usado un escuadrón rebelde para detener a un contingente enemigo.
description.schinese: 使用一支叛军小队拦住一支敌军
description.russian: Вы остановили войска противника с помощью повстанцев
description.japanese: 反乱軍を使って敵部隊の進行を阻んだ
description.polish: Powstrzymaj oddział wroga za pomocą drużyny rebeliantów
description.brazilian: Usou um esquadrão rebelde para deter uma tropa inimiga

description.english: Finished the game in hard difficulty mode
description.german: Das Spiel auf Schwierigkeitsstufe Schwer abgeschlossen
description.french: Vous avez terminé le jeu au niveau de difficulté Difficile.
description.italian: Hai completato il gioco al livello difficile.
description.spanish: Has acabado el juego en el modo de dificultad Difícil.
description.schinese: 在困难模式下完成通关游戏
description.russian: Вы закончили игру на высоком уровне сложности
description.japanese: 難易度「ハード」でゲームをクリア
description.brazilian: Completou o jogo no modo difícil

description.english: 10 enemies killed a guy from their own team
description.german: 10 Feinde haben jemanden aus den eigenen Reihen getötet
description.french: Vous avez poussé 10 ennemis à tuer un membre de leur équipe.
description.italian: Hai fatto in modo che 10 nemici uccidessero un membro della propria squadra.
description.spanish: 10 enemigos han matado a un tipo de su propio equipo.
description.schinese: 让10个敌人杀死过他们的队友
description.japanese: 10人の敵が自軍の仲間1人を殺した
description.brazilian: 10 inimigos mataram alguém da sua própria equipe

description.english: Finish the game only with 2 mercs
description.german: Das Spiel mit nur 2 Söldnern durchgespielt
description.french: Vous avez terminé le jeu avec seulement 2 mercenaires.
description.italian: Hai completato il gioco con solo due mercenari.
description.spanish: Has acabado el juego con solo 2 mercenarios.
description.schinese: 只用2个雇佣兵完成通关游戏
description.japanese: 傭兵2人だけでゲームをクリア
description.polish: Ukończ grę z oddziałem zaledwie 2 najemników
description.brazilian: Completou o jogo com apenas 2 mercenários

description.english: You've seen all maps in the game
description.french: Vous avez vu toutes les cartes du jeu.
description.italian: Hai consultato tutte le mappe nel gioco.
description.spanish: Has visto todos los mapas del juego.
description.schinese: 见到游戏中的所有地图
description.russian: Вы посетили все карты в игре
description.japanese: ゲーム内のすべてのマップを訪問
